version_description:
Dear players!
The latest Zombie Shop version supports 3:4 screen resolutions and introduces interface updates to several essential game windows. There are also a few other improvements that will help you push back against those zombies.
Oh, and we’ve added 4 new languages: Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese.

Best of shopkeeping luck to you!

Dear players!
The latest Zombie Shop version supports 3:4 screen resolutions and introduces interface updates to several essential game windows. There are also a few other improvements that will help you push back against those zombies.
Oh, and we’ve added 4 new languages: Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese.

Best of shopkeeping luck to you!

Dear players!
The latest Zombie Shop version supports 3:4 screen resolutions and introduces interface updates to several essential game windows. There are also a few other improvements that will help you push back against those zombies.
Oh, and we’ve added 4 new languages: Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese.

Best of shopkeeping luck to you!

Any non-zombies here?
Meanwhile, the gains of exploring regions infested with zombie hordes have gone up!
For example, in Supply Runs, you can now find Strongboxes with all sorts of valuables inside. However, they may also contain unique furniture that not only helps decorate your shop, but generates unique bonuses, too!

Ah! We've thrown in many bug fixes and upgrades, including the interface. So supplying the zombie world survivors with useful items is now even more intuitive and fun!

Any non-zombies here?
Meanwhile, the gains of exploring regions infested with zombie hordes have gone up!
For example, in Supply Runs, you can now find Strongboxes with all sorts of valuables inside. However, they may also contain unique furniture that not only helps decorate your shop, but generates unique bonuses, too!

Ah! We've thrown in many bug fixes and upgrades, including the interface. So supplying the zombie world survivors with useful items is now even more intuitive and fun!

Any non-zombies here?
Meanwhile, the gains of exploring regions infested with zombie hordes have gone up!
For example, in Supply Runs, you can now find Strongboxes with all sorts of valuables inside. However, they may also contain unique furniture that not only helps decorate your shop, but generates unique bonuses, too!

Ah! We've thrown in many bug fixes and upgrades, including the interface. So supplying the zombie world survivors with useful items is now even more intuitive and fun!

"A nice bunch of improvements to boost your zombie survival!

1. Rebalanced town defense mode:
- More Supplies awarded for Supply Runs and item crafting!
- Increased bonuses for survival during defense!
- Lower difficulty for beginners
2. Greater Arcade gains thanks to fewer bucks per game start!
3. Performance and the interface packed with useful changes—like a truck packed with uncapacitated zombies.

No giving up! It's about time you taught a couple of hundred zombies some manners."
